verses.verse: When you go <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>battle<s%> against your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H7393>chariots<s%>, and a <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7227>more<s%> than <S%H3372>you<s%>, be not afraid of <S%H3068>them<s%>: for the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> is with <S%H5927>you<s%>, which brought you up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And it shall <S%H7126>be<s%>, when you are come near unto the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, that the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5066>approach<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>,

And shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, Hear, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, you <S%H7131>approach<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> unto <S%H4421>battle<s%> against your <S%H341>enemies<s%>: let not your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> <S%H7401>faint<s%>, <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H2648>not<s%>, and do not tremble, neither be you <S%H6206>terrified<s%> because of <S%H6440>them<s%>;
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is he that <S%H1980>goes<s%> with <S%H3898>you<s%>, to fight for you against your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, to save <S%H3467>you<s%>.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H376>man<s%> is there that has <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and has not <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> <S%H3212>it<s%>? let him go and <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> dedicate <S%H2596>it<s%>.

And what <S%H376>man<s%> is he that has <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, and has not yet <S%H2490>eaten<s%> of <S%H3212>it<s%>? let him also go and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> eat of <S%H2490>it<s%>.

And what <S%H376>man<s%> is there that has <S%H781>married<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and has not <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H3212>her<s%>? let him go and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest he <S%H4191>die<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> take <S%H3947>her<s%>.

And the <S%H7860>officers<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3254>further<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and they shall <S%H559>say<s%>, What <S%H376>man<s%> is there that is <S%H3373>fearful<s%> and <S%H7390>fainthearted<s%>? let him <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> unto his <S%H1004>house<s%>, lest his <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>faint<s%> as well as his <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

And it shall <S%H7860>be<s%>, when the officers have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they shall <S%H6485>make<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>armies<s%> to <S%H7218>lead<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>.
When you come <S%H7126>near<s%> unto a <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H7121>it<s%>, then proclaim peace unto <S%H7965>it<s%>.

And it shall <S%H6030>be<s%>, if it make you answer of <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and <S%H6605>open<s%> unto <S%H5971>you<s%>, then it shall be, that all the people that is <S%H4672>found<s%> in it shall be <S%H4522>tributaries<s%> unto <S%H5647>you<s%>, and they shall serve you.
And if it will make no <S%H7999>peace<s%> with <S%H6213>you<s%>, but will make <S%H4421>war<s%> against <S%H6696>you<s%>, then you shall besiege it:

And when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hands<s%>, you shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> every <S%H2138>male<s%> there with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%>:

But the <S%H802>women<s%>, and the little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and all that is in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, even all the <S%H7998>plunder<s%> <S%H962>there<s%>, shall you take unto <S%H398>yourself<s%>; and you shall eat the <S%H7998>plunder<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given <S%H5414>you<s%>.

Thus shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> unto all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which are <S%H3966>very<s%> far <S%H7350>off<s%> from <S%H2007>you<s%>, which are not of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

But of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of these <S%H5971>people<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> does <S%H5414>give<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, you shall save <S%H2421>alive<s%> nothing that <S%H5397>breathes<s%>:

But you shall <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H2850>them<s%>; namely, the Hittites, and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusites<s%>; as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>:

That they <S%H3925>teach<s%> you not to <S%H6213>do<s%> after all their <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, which they have <S%H6213>done<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods<s%>; so should you <S%H2398>sin<s%> against the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

When you shall <S%H6696>besiege<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%>, in making <S%H3898>war<s%> against it to <S%H8610>take<s%> <S%H7843>it<s%>, you shall not destroy the <S%H6086>trees<s%> there by <S%H5080>wielding<s%> an <S%H1631>axe<s%> against <S%H398>them<s%>: for you may eat of <S%H3772>them<s%>, and you shall not cut them down (for the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> is <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H935>life<s%>) to employ them in the <S%H6440>siege<s%>:

Only the <S%H6086>trees<s%> which you <S%H3045>know<s%> that they be not <S%H6086>trees<s%> for <S%H3978>food<s%>, you shall <S%H7843>destroy<s%> and cut them <S%H3772>down<s%>; and you shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H4692>bulwarks<s%> against the <S%H5892>city<s%> that <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with <S%H3381>you<s%>, until it be subdued.
